10Bedazzled_desc: The damage over time effect from your Dazzlers lasts 2 seconds longer and deals 100% more damage. Gain a Nami and a Bard.
10BigGains_desc: Your team gains 80 bonus Health, and permanently gains 10 Health every 2 takedowns.
10BiggerShot_desc: Every 3 attacks, Big Shots also fire a bomb that deals 65% Attack Damage to enemies within 1 hex of the target. Gain a Kai'Sa.
10BlankSlate_desc: Immediately sell your team (including bench) for 200% of their value. Your next 8 Shop rerolls are free.
10BlingedOut_desc: Your True Damage champions gain 100 Health and 8% Attack Speed for each item they are holding. Gain a Yasuo and a Senna.
10Country_BountyHunters_desc: Country champions have a 20% chance to drop 1 gold on kill. Your Dreadsteed's chances are doubled. Gain a Samira.
10CrashTestDummies_desc: Gain 2 Target Dummies. Combat start: Your Target Dummies launch themselves towards the largest clump of enemies and Stun them for 2 seconds.
10CrownGuarded_desc: Gain a Crownguard. Your Crownguards' start of combat effect is 75% stronger.
10Determinedinvestors_desc:
The first time you have 40 gold at the end of combat, gain Diamond Hands and 2 random component(s).

This defensive item helps you gain more gold.
10EmotionalConnection_desc: Allies of your Emo champions gain 60% of the Emo Mana bonus when any ally dies. Gain an Annie and a Vex.
10EncoreHeadliner_desc: The first time your Headliner dies, they become invulerable and heal 60% of their max Health over 1.5 seconds instead.
10Executioner_ExposeWeakness_desc:
Damage from Executioners' attacks and spells Shred and Sunder enemies by 40% for 3 seconds. Gain a Twitch.

(Shred: reduce Magic Resist, Sunder: reduce Armor)
10FullyAdapted_desc: Gain an Adaptive Helm. Champions holding this item gain both effects, regardless of position.
10GoingLong_desc:
You no longer gain interest. Round start: gain 4 XP.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.
10GoodForSomething_desc: Champions that aren't holding items have a 50% to drop 1 gold on death.
10GoodForSomethingSilver_desc: Champions that aren't holding items have a 30% to drop 1 gold on death.
10GuardianHeroicPresence_desc: Enemies that attack a Guardian's shield take magic damage equal to 7% of the shielded unit's max Health (up to once per second). Gain a Pantheon.
10HeadlinerWoodlandCharm_desc: Create a clone of your Headliner champion with 100% -130% of its base health (based on stage level). You cannot equip items on the clone.
10HeartCollector_desc: Keep 20% of the Heartsteel hearts you convert into rewards. Your Heartsteel champions gain 200 Health. Gain a K'Sante and an Aphelios.
10HeavyHitters_desc: Your units with at least 1500 max Health gain Attack Damage and Ability Power equal to 1% of their max Health.
10HelpIsOnTheWay_desc: After 6 player combats, choose 1 of 4 Support items.
10HeroicGrabBag_desc:
Gain 2 Lesser Champion Duplicators and 2 gold.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.
10InsertCoin_desc:
Your 8-Bit champions execute targets below 10% Health. Executions have a 10% chance to drop 1 gold, increased by 2% for each high score achieved. Gain a Corki and a Garen.

Current drop chance: @tft10_augment_insertcoin_goldchance@%
10InspiringEpitaph_desc: When a unit dies, the nearest ally gains a 30% max Health Shield and 10% stacking Attack Speed.
10LearningToSpell_desc: Your team gains 10 bonus Ability Power, and permanently gains 1 Ability Power every 2 takedowns.
10LittleBuddies_desc: Your 4-cost and 5-cost champions gain 100 Health and 10% Attack Speed  for every 1-cost and 2-cost champion on your board.
10LiveForDanger_desc: Edgelords attacks deal 30% of their damage to enemies within 1 hexes of their target. Gain a Yasuo and a Kayle.
10LowInterestRates_desc:
Your max interest is capped at 2 gold but you gain 2 gold at the start of every player combat.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.
10LuckyStreak_desc:
Gain a Gambler's Blade and a Magnetic Remover.

Gambler's Blade helps you gain gold.
10MesmerizingPerformance_desc: Your units that start combat in a lighted hex gain a 30% max Health shield for 10 seconds. Gain a Kai'Sa and Lillia.
10MetalHeads_desc: Your Pentakill champions are immune to crowd control for the first 12 seconds of combat. They heal 4% of their max Health on takedown. Gain a Kayle and a Gnar.
10RampingRhythm_desc: Rapidfire champions can gain Attack Speed from their trait up to 30 stacks. Gain a Jinx and a Senna.
10ReachTheSummit_desc: When you reach Level 9, gain 50 XP.
10RememberYourRoots_desc: Allies sharing a trait with your Headliner gain 200 Health and 10% Attack Speed.
10RepetitiveRiffing_desc:
Gain bonuses for starring Punk champions.
2-star: Your next Shop reroll costs 1 gold less
3-star: Gain 1 component
10Scapegoat_desc: Gain a Training Dummy and 2 gold. If it is the first to die each player combat, gain 1 gold.
10ShockTreatment_desc: Gain a Statikk Shiv. Your Statikk Shivs' chain lightning effects deal 40-125% more damage (based on stage level).
10SilverVeil_desc: Your team gains 5% Attack Speed and is immune to the first crowd control effect in combat.
10SpellweaverHalftimeShow_desc: When your Spellweavers cast their 2nd Ability each combat, they instantly cast it again at 50% effectiveness. Gain a Gragas and a Seraphine.
10SticksAndStones_desc:
Champions that aren't holding items Shred and Sunder enemies for 3 seconds. Physical damage Sunders for 30%, and magic damage Shreds for 30%.
Shred: reduces Magic Resist, Sunder: reduces Armor
10Stimpack_desc:
Gain 4 components after you lose 50 player health.

(Health lost this game: @tft10_augment_stimpack_healthlost@)
10SubmitToThePit_desc: For each adjacent enemy, Moshers gain 3 Armor, 3 Magic Resist, 3% Attack Damage, 3 Ability Power, and 3% Attack Speed. Gain a Jax and a Gnar.
10Superfan_ForTheFans_desc: Your Headliner's damage heals your Superfans for 22% of the damage dealt. Gain a Gnar.
10SwitchingGears_desc: Gain 2 gold whenever you break your win or loss streak.
10TalentSearch_desc: All of your champions gain their unique Headliner effect. In Addition, your Headliner gains 100 Health and 10% Attack Speed.
10ThatsJazzBaby_desc:
Gain a Bard. Combat start: Jazz champions gain permanent bonuses based on the number of active traits.
3: 40 max Health
5: and 3% Attack Speed
7: and 2% Attack Damage and 2 Ability Power
10TheDrop_desc: After their first sampled cast, EDM champions will sample 30% more frequently. Gain a Lux.
10TooBigToFail_desc: On death, Bruisers deal 30% of their max Health to enemies within 1 hex. After 20 seconds, expand the range to 2 hexes. Gain an Olaf and a Gragas.
10TwinTerror1_desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 250 Health, 25% Attack Speed, and 25% Critical Strike Chance. Anytime you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.
10TwinTerror2_desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 350 Health, 35% Attack Speed, and 35% Critical Strike Chance. Anytime you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.
10Vampirism_desc:
Your team gains 20 Health. Gain another 4 Health and 1% Omnivamp per 5 missing player health.
(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)
10VampirismPlus_desc:
Your team gains 50 Health. Gain another 6 Health and 1% Omnivamp per 5 missing player health.
(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)
6Ascension_desc: After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 50% more damage.
6BinaryAirdrop_desc:
Combat start: champions holding 2 items gain a random 3rd completed item.

Gain 1 random component now.
6ClearMind_desc: If there are no champions on your bench at the end of player combat, gain 3 XP.
6CyberneticUplink1_desc: Your champions holding an item gain 80 Health and restore 2 Mana per second.
6CyberneticUplink2_desc: Your champions holding an item gain 120 Health and restore 2.5 Mana per second.
6CyberneticUplink3_desc: Your champions holding an item gain 200 Health and restore 3.5 Mana per second.
6ForceOfNature_desc: Gain +1 max team size and a Champion Duplicator.
6GachaAddict_desc: Each time your Shop is rerolled, you have a 45% chance to gain a free reroll.
6Keepers1_desc: Combat start: grant units with adjacent allies a 150 Health Shield for 8 seconds. This Shield stacks.
6Keepers2_desc: Combat start: grant units with adjacent allies a 220 Health Shield for 8 seconds. This Shield stacks.
6MaxLevel10_desc: When you buy XP, gain an additional 2. Gain 8 immediately.
6MetabolicAccelerator_desc: Gain 2 player health after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.
6OneTwoFive_desc: Gain 1 random component, 2 gold, and 1 random 5-cost champion.
6PandorasItems_desc:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized (except Tactician's Crown and Spatula).

Gain 1 random component.
6PortableForge_desc:
Choose 1 of 2 Artifacts.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.
6PortableForgePlus_desc:
Choose 1 of 3 Artifacts.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.
6PortableForgePlusPlus_desc:
Choose 1 of 4 Artifacts.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.
6RadiantRelics_desc:
Choose 1 of 5 Radiant items. Gain a Magnetic Remover.

Radiant items are very powerful versions of completed items.
6Recombobulator_desc: Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions 1 cost tier higher. Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.
6RichGetRicher_desc:
Gain 12 gold. Your max interest is increased to 7.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.
6RichGetRicherPlus_desc:
Gain 18 gold. Your max interest is increased to 7.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.
6SalvageBin_desc: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 7 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).
6SlowAndSteady_desc: Gain 3 XP now, and bonus XP equal to your level at the start of every player combat round. You can no longer use gold to level up.
6TheGoldenEgg_desc: Gain a golden egg that hatches in 11 turns for a huge amount of loot. Winning player combat speeds up the hatch timer by an extra turn.
6TinyTitans_desc: Increase your current and maximum player health by 30.
6TradeSector_desc: Gain a free Shop reroll every round. Gain 2 gold.
7AFK_desc: You cannot perform actions for the next 3 rounds. Afterwards, gain 18 gold.
7BestFriends1_desc: Units isolated in pairs gain 10% Attack Speed and 10 Armor at the start of combat.
7BestFriends2_desc: Units isolated in pairs gain 15% Attack Speed and 20 Armor at the start of combat.
7BirthdayPresents_desc: Gain a 2-star champion every time you level up. The champion's cost tier is your level minus 4 (min: 1-cost).
7ClutteredMind_desc: Gain 4 random 1-cost champions now. If your bench is full at the end of player combat, gain 3 XP.
7Consistency_desc: Gain double win and loss streak gold.
7CursedCrown_desc: Gain +2 max team size, but take 100% more player damage when you lose a player combat.
7LastStand_desc: The first time you would be eliminated, you escape death and your team permanently gains 180 Health, 18 Armor and Magic Resist, and 18% Omnivamp.
7LategameSpecialist_desc: When you reach Level 9, gain 30 gold.
7LivingForge_desc:
Gain an Artifact anvil now and after every 10 player combats.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.
7LuckyGloves_desc: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 2 Sparring Gloves.
7LuckyGlovesPlus_desc: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 3 Sparring Gloves.
7PandorasBench_desc: Gain 2 gold. At the start of every round, champions on the 3 rightmost bench slots transform into random champions of the same cost.
7SacrificialPact_desc: Buying XP costs 6 player health instead of 4 gold. Heal 3 player health before each player combat.
8SalvageBinPlus_desc: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 4 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).
9ACutAbove_desc: Gain a Deathblade. Champions holding this item have a 20% chance to drop 1 gold on kill.
9ArmyBuilding_desc:
Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator. Gain another after 7 player combats.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.
9BalancedBudget2_desc: At the start of the next 4 rounds, gain 7 gold.
9BardPlaybook1_desc: Gain a random 2-cost champion now. Gain the same one again every time you level up.
9BardPlaybook2_desc:
Gain a component anvil when you reach level 5, 6, 7, and 8.

The anvil offers 4 choices.
9BardPlaybook3_desc:
As you level, gain more powerful items.
Level 4: component anvil
Level 6: completed item anvil
Level 8: choose 1 of 5 Radiant items
9BigGrabBag_desc:
Gain 3 random components, 2 gold, and 1 Reforger.

Reforgers allow you to remake any item.
9BlindingSpeed_desc:
Gain a Red Buff, Guinsoo's Rageblade, a Recurve Bow and a Magnetic Remover.

Useful for Attack Carries!
9BloodMoney_desc: Gain 3 gold per 10 Health your Tactician loses.
9BronzeTicket_desc: Gain a free Shop reroll after every 4 rerolls.
9BuildingACollection_desc: Gain a random item component at the start of the next 2 rounds (including this round).
9BuildingACollectionPlus_desc: Gain a random item component at the start of the next 3 rounds (including this round).
9BuildingACollectionPlusPlus_desc: Gain a random item component at the start of the next 6 rounds (including this round).
9CapriciousForge_desc:
Gain a Blacksmith's Gloves, which equips two random Artifacts each round.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.
9CombatCaster_desc: Your team gains 90-170 Shield for 6 seconds after casting their Ability. The Shield amount scales with round of the game.
9Commander_FinalAscension_desc: Your team deals 15% more damage. After 15 seconds, they deal 45% more damage.
9Commander_PartialAscension_desc: After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 30% more damage.
9Commander_RollingForDays_desc: Gain 8 free Shop rerolls that never expire.
9Commander_TeamingUp1_desc: Gain 1 random component and 2 random Tier 3 champions.
9Commander_TeamingUp2_desc: Gain 1 random Support item and 2 random 4-cost champions.
9Contagion_desc: Combat start: The highest Health enemy takes 18% more damage. Every 5 seconds, this effect spreads to 2 nearby enemies.
9CustomerIsAlwaysRight_desc:
Whenever you would get a component, gain a component anvil instead. Gain a random component.

The anvil offers 4 choices.
9CuttingCorners_desc:
Leveling up costs 4 XP less.

(Level 4 to 5 costs 6 XP instead of 10.)
9CyberneticBulk1_desc: Your champions holding an item gain 222 Health.
9CyberneticBulk2_desc: Your champions holding an item gain 333 health.
9CyberneticBulk3_desc: Your champions holding an item gain 555 health.
9DravenSpoilsOfWar_desc: Enemies have a 25% chance to drop loot when killed.
9DravenSpoilsOfWar2_desc: Enemies have a 30% chance to drop loot when killed.
9DravenSpoilsOfWar3_desc: Enemies have a 40% chance to drop loot when killed.
9EnshroudingStillness_desc:
All enemies take 1% of their max Health as true damage each second until they cast their Ability.
Gain a Shroud of Stillness.
9EscortQuest_desc: Gain a Training Dummy. You gain 3 gold every time it survives player combat.
9FinalReserves_desc: The first time you would be eliminated, you instead remain alive. After this happens, gain 70 XP and set your gold to 50. Excess gold is converted to XP.
9Formation1_desc: If you have 3 or more champions in the same row at the start of combat, they all gain 15 Armor and Magic Resist.
9Formation2_desc: If you have 3 or more champions in the same row at the start of combat, they all gain 25 Armor and Magic Resist.
9GargantuanResolve_desc: Gain a Titan's Resolve. Your Titan's Resolves can continue stacking to 40 instead of 25.
9GiftsFromTheFallen_desc:
Your team gains 3% Attack Damage, 3 Ability Power, 3 Armor, and 3 Magic Resist.

Each time an ally dies, gain these stats again.
9GreaterJeweledLotus_desc: Your team gains 40% Critical Strike chance, and their Abilities can critically strike.
9Harmacist1_desc:
Your team has 10% Omnivamp and converts 20% of excess healing to true damage on their next attack.

(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)
9Harmacist2_desc:
Your team has 15% Omnivamp and converts 25% of excess healing to true damage on their next attack.

(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)
9Harmacist3_desc:
Your team has 25% Omnivamp and converts 30% of excess healing to true damage on their next attack.

(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)
9HealingOrbsI_desc: When an enemy dies, the nearest ally is healed for 225.
9HealingOrbsII_desc: When an enemy dies, the nearest ally is healed for 450.
9HedgeFund_desc:
Gain 20 gold. Your max interest is increased to 10.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.
9HedgeFundPlus_desc:
Gain 30 gold. Your max interest is increased to 10.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.
9HedgeFundPlusPlus_desc:
Gain 40 gold. Your max interest is increased to 10.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.
9Idealism_desc: Gain a Hand of Justice. Champions holding this item deal 12% increased damage.
9ImpenetrableBulwark_desc:
Gain a Bramble Vest, a Dragon's Claw, a Giant's Belt, and a Magnetic Remover.

Useful for Magic Tanks or Attack Tanks!
9ImpromptuInventions_desc: Combat start: Up to 5 equipped components turn into completed items for the rest of combat. Gain a component at the start of the next 2 stages.
9IndomitableWill_desc: When your team scores a takedown, they shed all negative effects and become immune to crowd control for 10 seconds.
9InfernalContract_desc: Your max level is 7. Gain 75 gold.
9Infusion_desc: Your team restores 20 Mana every 5 seconds.
9IronAssets_desc:
Gain a component anvil and 4 gold.

The anvil offers 4 choices.
9JeweledLotus_desc: Your team gains 15% Critical Strike chance, and their Abilities can critically strike.
9JustKeepRolling_desc: After you reroll your Shop 8 times, rerolls only cost 1 gold.
9KnowYourEnemy_desc:
Your team deals 10% more damage.

Deal 15% more damage instead if you and your opponent have any of the same traits active.
9LearningFromExperience2_desc: After player combat, gain 2 XP if you won or 3 XP if you lost.
9LongDistanceRelationship2_desc: Combat start: Your 2 units furthest from each other form a bond, sharing 20% of their Armor, Magic Resist, Attack Damage, and Ability Power with each other.
9LongTimeCrafting_desc:
After 8 player combats, gain an Artifact anvil.

The anvil offers 4 choices. Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.
9Martyr_desc: Whenever one of your allies die, your team heals for 9% of their max Health.
9MissedConnections_desc: Gain a copy of each 1-cost champion.
9MoneyHealsAllWounds_desc: Round start: Gain 3 gold. If you have at least 40 gold, heal 2 player health.
9NotToday_desc: Gain an Edge of Night. Champions holding this item gain 35% Attack Speed.
9OldMansWalkingStick_desc: Gain a Needlessly Large Rod. Your units gain 18 Ability Power.
9OnARoll_desc: Whenever you star up a champion, gain up to 2 free Shop rerolls per round. Gain 2 gold.
9OneHundredDuckSizedHorses_desc: Gain +3 maximum team size, but your units can only hold 1 item and their total health is reduced by 15%. Gain 4 gold.
9OverwhelmingForce_desc:
Gain a Deathblade, an Infinity Edge, a BF Sword, and a Magnetic Remover.

Useful for Attack Carries or Attack Fighters!
9PandorasItems2_desc:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown and Spatula).

Gain 1 random completed item.
9PandorasRadiantBox_desc:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown and Spatula).

Gain 1 random Radiant item.
9PhreakyFriday_desc:
Gain an Infinity Force. After 5 player combats, gain another.

Infinity Force: Artifact that offers tons of offensive and defensive stats
9PhreakyFridayPlus_desc:
Gain an Infinity Force. After 3 player combats, gain another.

Infinity Force: Artifact that offers tons of offensive and defensive stats
9PumpingUp_desc: Your team gains 8% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 0.5% more.
9PumpingUp2_desc: Your team gains 8% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 1% more.
9PumpingUp3_desc: Your team gains 12% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 2% more.
9RedBuff_desc: Your team's attacks burn their targets for 5% of their max Health over 5 seconds. Attacks also reduce their targets' healing received by 33%.
9ReturnOnInvestment_desc: When you reroll your Shop 18 times, gain a Tactician's Crown.
9RiskyMoves_desc: Your Tactician loses 20 Health, but after 7 player combats, gain 30 gold.
9RollTheDice_desc:
Gain a Rascal's Gloves item. This equips 2 random Radiant items every round.

Radiant items are very powerful versions of completed items.
9SilverTicket_desc: Each time your Shop is rerolled, you have a 30% chance to gain a free reroll.
9Sleightofhand_desc: Gain a Thief's Gloves. Champions holding this item gain 200 Health and 20% Attack Speed.
9StarsAreBorn_desc: The first 1-cost and 2-cost champions you buy are instantly upgraded to 2-star. Gain 1 gold.
9StarterKit_desc:
Gain a 4-cost champion and a 2-star 1-cost champion that shares a trait with them.

At the start of the next 2 stages, gain that 4-cost champion again.
9StationarySupport1_desc: After 7 player combats, gain 1 Training Dummy(s) with 1 permanently attached Support item(s).
9StationarySupport2_desc: Gain 1 Training Dummy with 1 permanently attached Support item(s).
9StationarySupport3_desc: Gain 1 Training Dummy with 2 permanently attached Support item(s).
9ThreesACrowd_desc: Your team gains 85 Health for each unique 3-cost champion on your board.
9TiniestTitan_desc: Gain 2 player health and 1 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.
9TiniestTitanPlus_desc:
Gain 2 player health and 1 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.

Gain 8 gold now.
9TonsOfStats_desc: Your team gains 44 Health, 4% Attack Damage, 4 Ability Power, 4 Armor, 4 Magic Resist, 4% Attack Speed, and 4 Mana.
9TwoHealthy_desc: Your team gains 110 Health for each unique 2-cost champion on your board.
9UnleashedArcana_desc:
Gain a Jeweled Gauntlet, a Rabadon's Deathcap, a Needlessly Large Rod, and a Magnetic Remover.

Useful for Magic Carries or Magic Casters!
9WhatDoesntKillYou_desc: Gain 2 gold after losing a player combat. Gain a random component after every 4 losses.
9WhatTheForge_desc: Completed items you own (except Tactician's Crown and Emblems) are transformed into random Artifacts. Champions gain 110 Health per equipped Artifact.
9YouHaveMyBow_desc: Gain a Recurve Bow. Your units gain 12% Attack Speed.
9YouHaveMySword_desc: Gain a B.F. Sword. Your units gain 15% Attack Damage.
9YoungAndWildAndFree_desc: You can always move freely on Carousel rounds. Gain 3 gold.
9StationarySupport1HR_desc: After 4 player combats, gain 1 Training Dummy(s) with 1 permanently attached Support item(s).
9PumpingUpHR_desc: Your team gains 5% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 1% more.
9LongTimeCraftingHR_desc:
After 4 player combats, gain an Artifact anvil.

The anvil offers 4 choices. Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.
9PhreakyFridayPlusHR_desc:
Gain an Infinity Force. After 2 player combats, gain another.

Infinity Force: Artifact that offers tons of offensive and defensive stats
9PumpingUp3HR_desc: Your team gains 12% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 4% more.
9PhreakyFridayHR_desc:
Gain an Infinity Force. After 3 player combats, gain another.

Infinity Force: Artifact that offers tons of offensive and defensive stats
9PumpingUp2HR_desc: Your team gains 5% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 2% more.
9ACutAboveHR_desc: Gain a Deathblade. Champions holding this item have a 25% chance to drop 2 gold on kill.
9ArmyBuildingHR_desc:
Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator. Gain another after 3 player combats.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.
9PiltoverShimmeringInventorsHR_desc: Your Piltover units deal 8% more damage for every 3 gold you have (max: 40%), and have a 33% chance to drop 2 gold at round start. Gain an Ekko.
6TheGoldenEggHR_desc: Gain a golden egg that hatches in 6 turns for a huge amount of loot. Winning player combat speeds up the hatch timer by an extra turn.
7LivingForgeHR_desc:
Gain an Artifact anvil now and after every 4 player combats.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.
8SalvageBinPlusHR_desc: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 2 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).
6SalvageBinHR_desc: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 3 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).
